items.title: Anker’s expanded SOLIX Black Friday Sale increases power station savings up to 70% with new lows starting from $150
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

items.title: We love Anker’s 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display and it just hit $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand for $149.49 shipped. This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

items.title: Save up to 55% on Dyson vacuums, purifiers, stylers, more back at lowest prices for Black Friday starting from $250
items.summary:
As part of the Amazon Black Friday Sale, you can now pick up Dyson’s V8 Plus Cordless Stick Vacuum at $279.99 shipped for the first time since 2024, along with a bunch more cleaning devices, beauty devices, and air purifiers. While normally fetching $470 at full price these days, we’ve mostly seen this package keeping between $390 and $350 over the year, with some falls as low as $300, the only two of which happened during both July and October’s Prime Day events. This deal also beats out the one-day-only Target offer on the V8 Origin package, giving you more accessory attachments at the lowest tracked price that hasn’t been seen since Cyber Monday sales in 2024. Head below to get the full rundown on Dyson Black Friday deals while they last.

more…

Amazon has kicked off its Carhartt Early Black Friday Sale, offering shoppers up to 44% off a wide range of workwear, everyday apparel, boots, and more. Carhartt, respected for its durable, dependable work gear has seen a major surge in mainstream popularity, evolving from a trusted utility brand into a staple of modern streetwear.
